attributes.action: recognise the uniquely valuable input into the British Legeslative arm of Government that is the Life Peer and abandon all attempts to introduce a wholly or partially elected second chamber.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst there has undoubtedly been abuse of the Lords, from the days of Lloyd George to the present, the Life Peers offer unique insights into prospective legislation based upon their life knowledge.

Moreover they are, relatively, immune from the fray of party politics.

Elected peers will be yet another bunch of mediocre party hacks in cheap ill-fitting suits more interested in furthering their own careers than what is best for the country.

God spare us this hell.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
